NAME: Name
TUTORIAL_SLIDE1_DESCRIPTION:
A simple app designed to help you to plan out your retirement

If you want to skip the tutorial, tap skip on the top right hand side
TUTORIAL_SLIDE2_DESCRIPTION:
This is your signup and login page

Tap 'SIGN IN' if you already have an account, if not, create a new one by tapping 'SIGN UP'
TUTORIAL_SLIDE3_DESCRIPTION:
This is your profile page

The area highlighted in BLUE shows your profile name and email, and the area highlighted in GREEN displays your saved charts
Tapping the area circled in ORANGE opens up your sidemenu
TUTORIAL_SLIDE5_DESCRIPTION: Your sidemenu helps to provide you an easy way to access all of the features in Time2Retire
TUTORIAL_SLIDE6_DESCRIPTION:
Our chart feature helps graph out your social security payments based on your date of birth, ammount paid to social security, and your average income

The two info buttons highlighted in RED, displays helpful information about the details you are entering
TUTORIAL_SLIDE7_DESCRIPTION: The information you have entered is processed and displayed by this chart, showing your best age to retire at, what age you should be to break even, and what you will receive in monthly benefits in the BLUE BAR, compared to your total benefits in the RED BAR
TUTORIAL_SLIDE8_DESCRIPTION:
Before saving, you can customize your chart by adjusting the sliders in the area highlighted in GREEN below

The BLUE point adjusts your retirement age while the ORANGE point adjusts your life expectancy
TUTORIAL_SLIDE9_DESCRIPTION: Every chart that you have created in our charts page is saved right here for you to view
WELCOME_INTRO: The starting point for your next great Ionic app
LOGIN_ERROR: Unable to sign in. Please check your account information and try again.
SIGNUP_ERROR: Unable to create account. Please check your account information and try again.
SEARCH_PLACEHOLDER: Search the items list, e.g. "Donald Duck"
